name: Cutting Off Reality
description:
This is a shooter game. You the player named Astral have to defend yourself from enemies and reach the end. You are slowing cutting loose from reality. The real world is becoming unclear and you are getting attacked by enemies or so you think. There is an unreal mode to explore to easier end your enemies lives. There are fun and deadly mechanics like, Jump pads, doors, buttons with timers, deadly liquids, spikes and enemies who chase you and run away.

Game programmed by: degamingninja

Game art by: Andynort
